returns._0: Address to transfer tokens in order for swap() to work

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setSwapGasEstimate(uint256).details: this is estimated amount of gas that's used by swap() implementation

params.to: address where swapped funds should be sent to

returns.amountOut: amount of tokenOut tokens received in swap

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

tokenIndex.details: Base Adapter is using int128 for indexes and is using exchange() for swaps

query(uint256,address,address).notice: Get query for a swap through this adapter

swap(uint256,address,address,address).notice: Execute a swap with given input amount of tokens from tokenIn to tokenOut,         assuming input tokens were transferred to depositAddress(tokenIn, tokenOut)
